name: Super Luigi
description:
Super Luigi is an offshoot of New Super Luigi U, styled after classic SMB1 from the NES... Hold on, have i seen this before...? Yes! Yes you did if you checked MFGG recently! This game was originally made for the MFGG 2021 Winter Gamejam, and was since put on submission limbo. But was accepted on Mar10 day.

This game contains the Following:

- Accurate SMB1 Physics
- Mushrooms and Coins
- Fully Functional (and somewhat accurate) Bullet Bills, Koopas and Goombas
- Tense Platforming
- One deep-shadow-cutting Easter Egg!
- A full Score Tally!

And all that stuff.

Controls:

Z: Run

X: Jump

Arrow Keys: Move Left and Right
